name: Dengue Fever
description: Mosquito-borne viral infection causing high fever and joint pain.

name: Influenza
description: Acute respiratory infection caused by influenza viruses.

name: Type 2 Diabetes
description: Chronic condition affecting how the body processes blood sugar.

name: Hypertension
description: High blood pressure that can lead to severe complications.

name: Cystic Fibrosis
description: Genetic disorder affecting the lungs and digestive system.

name: Malaria
description: Parasitic infection transmitted by Anopheles mosquitoes.

name: Sickle Cell Anemia
description: Inherited red blood cell disorder.

name: Asthma
description: Chronic inflammation of the airways.

name: Tuberculosis
description: Bacterial infection primarily affecting the lungs.

name: Alzheimer's Disease
description: Progressive neurodegenerative disease causing memory loss.

name: Multiple Sclerosis
description: Disease where the immune system eats away at the nerves.

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
description: Chronic inflammatory disorder affecting joints.

name: Coronary Artery Disease
description: Narrowing of the coronary arteries.

name: Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease
description: Digestive disorder affecting the lower esophageal sphincter.

name: Crohn's Disease
description: Type of inflammatory bowel disease.

name: Hypothyroidism
description: Condition where the thyroid gland is underactive.

name: Pneumonia
description: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs.

name: Migraine
description: Recurrent throbbing headache typically affecting one side.

name: Psoriasis
description: Skin cells build up and form scales and itchy dry patches.

name: Celiac Disease
description: Immune reaction to eating gluten.

name: Lyme Disease
description: Tick-borne illness caused by Borrelia burgdorferi.

name: Cholera
description: Acute diarrheal infection caused by ingestion of contaminated food.

name: Gout
description: Form of arthritis characterized by severe pain and redness.

name: Parkinson's Disease
description: Disorder of the central nervous system affecting movement.

name: Epilepsy
description: Disorder in which nerve cell activity in brain is disturbed.

name: Schizophrenia
description: Serious mental disorder affecting how a person thinks.

name: Bipolar Disorder
description: Disorder associated with episodes of mood swings.

name: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
description: Immune system attacks its own tissues.

name: Hepatitis B
description: Severe liver infection caused by the HBV virus.

name: Hepatitis C
description: Viral infection that causes liver inflammation.

name: HIV/AIDS
description: Interferes with the body's ability to fight infection.

name: Zika Virus
description: Mosquito-borne virus; risk to fetal development.

name: Ebola Virus Disease
description: Severe, often fatal illness in humans.

name: Measles
description: Highly contagious infectious disease caused by virus.

name: Mumps
description: Viral infection that affects salivary glands.

name: Rubella
description: Contagious viral infection best known by its red rash.

name: Pertussis
description: Highly contagious respiratory tract infection.

name: Tetanus
description: Serious bacterial infection causing painful muscle spasms.

name: Diphtheria
description: Serious infection of the nose and throat.

name: Typhoid Fever
description: Bacterial infection caused by Salmonella typhi.

name: Leishmaniasis
description: Parasitic disease found in parts of the tropics.

name: Trypanosomiasis
description: African sleeping sickness transmitted by tsetse flies.

name: Schistosomiasis
description: Disease caused by parasitic flatworms.

name: Anemia (Iron Deficiency)
description: Condition lacking enough healthy red blood cells.

name: Hemophilia A
description: Genetic disorder where blood doesn't clot normally.

name: Huntington's Disease
description: Inherited condition causing nerve cells in brain to break down.

name: Down Syndrome
description: Genetic chromosome 21 disorder.

name: Marfan Syndrome
description: Disorder that affects connective tissue.

name: Tay-Sachs Disease
description: Rare disorder that destroys nerve cells in the brain.

name: Thalassemia
description: Blood disorder involving less oxygen-carrying protein.

name: COPD
description: Chronic inflammatory lung disease that obstructs airflow.

name: Sleep Apnea
description: Sleep disorder where breathing repeatedly starts and stops.

name: Pulmonary Fibrosis
description: Lung disease that occurs when lung tissue becomes damaged.

name: Cushing's Syndrome
description: Condition from exposure to high cortisol levels.

name: Addison's Disease
description: Adrenal glands don't produce enough hormones.

name: Graves' Disease
description: Immune system disorder resulting in overproduction of thyroid.

name: Hashimoto's Thyroiditis
description: Immune system attacks the thyroid.

name: Osteoporosis
description: Condition in which bones become weak and brittle.

name: Osteoarthritis
description: Type of arthritis when flexible tissue at ends of bones wears down.

name: Scoliosis
description: Sideways curvature of the spine.

name: Glaucoma
description: Group of eye conditions that damage the optic nerve.

name: Cataracts
description: Clouding of the normally clear lens of the eye.

name: Macular Degeneration
description: Eye disease that causes vision loss.

name: Chronic Kidney Disease
description: Gradual loss of kidney function over time.

name: Polycystic Kidney Disease
description: Genetic disorder causing cysts to grow in kidneys.

name: Cirrhosis
description: Late stage of scarring of the liver.

name: Pancreatitis (Chronic)
description: Inflammation of the pancreas.

name: Ulcerative Colitis
description: Inflammatory bowel disease causing sores in digestive tract.

name: Peptic Ulcer
description: Sores that develop on the lining of the stomach.

name: Appendicitis
description: Inflammation of the appendix.

name: Diverticulitis
description: Inflammation or infection of small pouches in digestive tract.

name: Eczema
description: Condition that makes skin red and itchy.

name: Vitiligo
description: Loss of skin pigment in patches.

name: Alopecia Areata
description: Sudden hair loss that starts with one or more circular patches.

name: Melanoma
description: The most serious type of skin cancer.

name: Breast Cancer
description: Cancer that forms in the cells of the breasts.

name: Lung Cancer
description: Cancer that begins in the lungs.

name: Prostate Cancer
description: Cancer in a man's prostate.

name: Leukemia
description: Cancer of blood-forming tissues.

name: Lymphoma
description: Cancer of the lymphatic system.

name: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
description: Nervous system disease that weakens muscles.

name: Myasthenia Gravis
description: Weakness and rapid fatigue of muscles under voluntary control.

name: Guillain-Barre Syndrome
description: Immune system attacks your nerves.

name: Meniere's Disease
description: Inner ear disorder that causes episodes of vertigo.

name: Narcolepsy
description: Chronic sleep disorder characterized by overwhelming daytime drowsiness.

name: Endometriosis
description: Tissue similar to the lining of the uterus grows outside it.

name: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
description: Hormonal disorder common among women of reproductive age.

name: Preeclampsia
description: High blood pressure and protein in urine during pregnancy.

name: Sepsis
description: Life-threatening reaction to an infection.

name: Meningitis (Bacterial)
description: Inflammation of brain and spinal cord membranes.

name: Encephalitis
description: Inflammation of the brain.

name: Lactose Intolerance
description: Inability to fully digest sugar in dairy.

name: Phenylketonuria
description: Birth defect that causes an amino acid to build up in the body.

name: Yellow Fever
description: Viral infection spread by a particular type of mosquito.

name: Rabies
description: Deadly virus spread to people from the saliva of infected animals.

name: Sjogren's Syndrome
description: Immune system disorder characterized by dry eyes and mouth.

name: Raynaud's Phenomenon
description: Reduced blood flow to fingers and toes.

name: Scleroderma
description: Chronic hardening and tightening of the skin.

name: Sarcoidosis
description: Growth of tiny collections of inflammatory cells.

name: Fibromyalgia
description: Widespread musculoskeletal pain accompanied by fatigue.
